You current license type is Regular. Whi: You current license type is Regular. While all the functionality is made available, Escrow Fees will not be charged on any trade. An Extended License or greater is required to enable this.
Ensure that the outgoing address is corr: Ensure that the outgoing address is correct.
Set the percentage to be charged on each: Set the percentage to be charged on each trade from the seller, this is stored securely on auto generated escrow wallets.
Fees may not be charged on some trades i: Fees may not be charged on some trades if it is below the minimum transferable amount. Refer to Settings > Transaction to learn more.
No chat found on any active trade!: No chat found on any active trade!
This will be applied to all pages in the: This will be applied to all pages in the User Area.
You should use a root domain for your la: You should use a root domain for your landing page e.g :domain while this platform is installed within a sub domain, say :subdomain
Set the unique IP address of your server: Set the unique IP address of your server in the field below for improved security, this will restrict public API access to the preset IP addresses separated by comma. Check the documentation for more details.
Please be aware that current license has: Please be aware that current license has been registered to this domain, and cannot be transferred. You may register a new license using the form below.
Ability to edit phrases manually will be: Ability to edit phrases manually will be made available in future updates!

Name: Name
Enter a payment verification time frame...
The time frame required to verify paymen: The time frame required to verify payment on a trade.
Fees may not be charged on trades if it: Fees may not be charged on trades if it is below the minimum transferable amount. For instance if $0.16 is the minimum transferable amount, and 1% is set as service fee, fees will only be charged if the amount involved in trade is above $16.
You should use this settings to enforce: You should use this settings to enforce both the minimum & maximum amount to be traded, if you want to ensure that your set percentage fees are charged on every trade. Use bitcoin as a reference, where minimum transferable is 0.00003BTC
By setting the required number of blocks: By setting the required number of blocks, the blockchain network is able to dynamically calculate miners fee for each transaction. Setting a high number of blocks results into lesser fees, however it takes more time to get a confirmation. If the number is too high, it may take weeks to get a confirmation or sometimes may not get confirmed at all by miners.
The platform automatically generates new: The platform automatically generates new wallets for storing earnings, while a wallet can contain as much coin as possible, it is advised to set a limit for privacy purpose.
This should be set a little bit above th: This should be set a little bit above the standard miners fee. It is needed to ensure that the transaction succeeds at all times, i.e to avoid error of insufficient balance.
The user will be denied access into the: The user will be denied access into the platform until reactivated!
The user will be granted access into the: The user will be granted access into the platform!
The user will be moved to the trash arch: The user will be moved to the trash archive. They can be restored at anytime.
The user record will be removed from the: The user record will be removed from the trash archive!
The user will be totally removed from th: The user will be totally removed from the record. This action cannot be undone!
Amounts are set at fixed price at the po: Amounts are set at fixed price at the point of initiating the trade!
Your offers are only visible to the publ: Your offers are only visible to the public when you have enough balance!
HOW MUCH DO YOU WANT TO BUY?: HOW MUCH DO YOU WANT TO BUY?

This is one of your offers!: This is one of your offers!
The user requires that you verify your e: The user requires that you verify your email before you can continue with the trade.
If you have not received a confirmation: If you have not received a confirmation email, you may resend in your profile settings
The user requires that you verify your p: The user requires that you verify your phone number before you can continue with the trade.
If you have not received a confirmation: If you have not received a confirmation sms, you may resend in your profile settings
Your amount should be between :min_amoun: Your amount should be between :min_amount and :max_amount
You will get :worth% worth of your money: You will get :worth% worth of your money in return for this trade.
Rate per :coin is :rate. You can buy any: Rate per :coin is :rate. You can buy any fraction
The buyer of this trade has a time limit: The buyer of this trade has a time limit of :deadline minutes to pay for the trade before the trade is cancelled by the system.
Trade will not auto-cancel when buyer ha: Trade will not auto-cancel when buyer has marked trade as paid. After that buyer has to wait for seller to release coin.
This offer will be disabled and hidden f: This offer will be disabled and hidden from other users!
This offer will be enabled and shown to: This offer will be enabled and shown to other users!
This offer will be removed from the mark: This offer will be removed from the marketplace!
The above value of :coin is held safely: The above value of :coin is held safely by our escrow service.
After making payment, you should click C: After making payment, you should click CONFIRM PAYMENT button to stop the counter. After making payment and you presume this as a scam attempt, you should click the RAISE DISPUTE button to call the attention of a moderator.
After verifying payment, you should clic: After verifying payment, you should click RELEASE COIN button to complete the trade. If you do not receive payment and you suspect this as a scam attempt, you should click the RAISE DISPUTE button to call the attention of a moderator.
A dispute has been raised over this trad: A dispute has been raised over this trade! Investigation will be conducted based on the previous chats as well as uploaded proof of payment. Any decision taking by our moderator should be considered as final!
Seller has confirmed your payment and re: Seller has confirmed your payment and released the coin into your wallet address!
The coin value of this transaction has b: The coin value of this transaction has been released into the wallet of the buyer.
The standard percentage fee of :fee has: The standard percentage fee of :fee has been charged as well for this trade.
Time left for buyer to complete payment:: Time left for buyer to complete payment:
Timer has been stopped! You need to wait: Timer has been stopped! You need to wait patiently for seller to release coin.
Payment has been confirmed by buyer! Ens: Payment has been confirmed by buyer! Ensure that you have received your full payment before you proceed to release coin.
Payment has been confirmed by buyer!: Payment has been confirmed by buyer!
You should upload the proof of payment,: You should upload the proof of payment, just in case the seller raises a dispute!
The coin held on escrow will be released: The coin held on escrow will be released to buyer. This cannot be undone!
The coin held on escrow will be returned: The coin held on escrow will be returned back to the seller!
This trade will be brought to the notice: This trade will be brought to the notice of our moderators!
Try to avoid traders that were last seen: Try to avoid traders that were last seen over a day ago. They may not be responsive!
You get coins in exchange for...
You are able to set several ways to pay: You are able to set several ways to pay for coins, if you are unable to find a preferred payment method, please contact our support center and we will gladly review your request.
Your offer will buy\/sell bitcoin for th: Your offer will buy/sell bitcoin for the selected currency. For example, if you select US Dollars then your offer is visible for everyone willing to sell bitcoin with US Dollar currency.
How much time you have to pay the seller: How much time you have to pay the seller. Trade will auto-cancel if you have not clicked "marked as paid" before payment window expires.
Add quick tags that best describe your o: Add quick tags that best describe your offer terms.
Any marketing text that will appear afte: Any marketing text that will appear after your payment method. Maximum 25 characters and only letters and numbers.
Shown once the trade has started. Trade: Shown once the trade has started. Trade instructions must be short, clear and bulleted if possible
You are able to set several ways to rece: You are able to set several ways to receive payment, if you are unable to find a preferred payment method, please contact our support center and we will gladly review your request.
Your offer will buy\/sell bitcoin for th: Your offer will buy/sell bitcoin for the selected currency. For example, if you select US Dollars then your offer is visible for everyone willing to buy bitcoin with US Dollar currency.
How much time person interested in your: How much time person interested in your offer has time to actually pay. Trade will auto-cancel if buyer has not clicked "marked as paid" before payment window expires.
This will grant the user to see your tru: This will grant the user to see your trusted only offers!
This will revoke the user from seeing yo: This will revoke the user from seeing your trusted only offers!
This will hide your offers from the user: This will hide your offers from the user!
This will show your offers to the user!: This will show your offers to the user!
The user will be totally removed from yo: The user will be totally removed from your contact list!
The user will be denied access into the: The user will be denied access into the platform!
Please exercise CAUTION while making cha: Please exercise CAUTION while making changes to the user role. You will only be allowed to update user role if the priority of their current role is less than yours.
Your profile picture will be reset to de: Your profile picture will be reset to default!
Save the entry first, and then enter the: Save the entry first, and then enter the code you receive
A new verification sms will be sent to y: A new verification sms will be sent to you.
Please follow the link provided in the v: Please follow the link provided in the verification email!
A new verification email will be sent to: A new verification email will be sent to you.
This is required when you make changes t: This is required when you make changes to your phone number or email address.
Scan the QR code with Google Authenticat: Scan the QR code with Google Authenticator or Auth Mobile App, or enter the code.
